text: Luis Miguel González Bosé (born April 3, 1956), usually known as Miguel Bosé, is a Panamanian-born Spanish pop new wave singer and actor. He was born in Panama City. He is known for his albums Papito and Papitwo. His mother was Italian actress and model Lucia Bosè. Bosé was honoured as the Latin Recording Academy Person of the Year on November 20, 2013.Miguel Bosé Named 2013 Latin Recording Academy Person Of The Year ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish singers Category:Spanish movie actors Category:People from Panama City Category:Panamanian singers
title: Miguel Bosé
